description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. 19 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Dark cream glazed paper with laid and chain lines visible. Fol. i is a fly-leaf with a modern label. On fol. 1a: Title of the first text followed by a table of contents by another hand (listing a few texts which are not in the actual state of the ms.). In this table as in the numbering in red ink of the texts, some texts here distinguished are not considered separate (texts 6, 8, and 11 in the table of contents of this record). On fol. 70a: Ownership statement and inscriptions. Copied by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Shāmah al-M[-]lī al-Ḥanbalī in Shaʻbān 814 in the Madrasat Abī ʻUmar? [in Damascus?, cf. Sauvaget, Les monuments historiques de Damas, no. 87] (see fol. 23a, 29b). However, if the Badr al-Dīn al-Ghazzī quoted on fol. 98a is Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad (1499-1577), this date might be incorrect.
author: Ibn Taymīyah, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm, 1263-1328
abstract: Collection of several texts, mostly by Ibn Taymīyah.
contents: 1. fol. 1a-5a: Lamḥat al-mukhtaṭif fī al-farq bayna al-ṭalāq wa-al-ḥilf / Ibn Taymīyah.
4. fol. 23b-29b: Qāʻidah fī al-amwāl al-sulṭānīyah / Ibn Taymīyah.
5. fol. 30a-37a: Futyā fī al-raqʻatayn allatayn yuqāl fī-himā anna-humā sunnat al-jumʻah / Ibn Taymīyah.
6. fol. 37a-37b: Masʼalah fī-mā yafʻaluhu baʻḍ al-khuṭabāʼ yawm al-Jumʻah / [Ibn Taymīyah?].
7. fol. 38a-43b: Qāʻidah jalīlah fī taḥzīb al-Qurʼān wa-fī kam yuqraʼ wa-fī bayān miqdār al-ṣiyām wa-al-qiyām al-mashrūʻ / Ibn Taymīyah.
8. fol. 43b-45b: Faṣl sūrat Ḥāʼ Mīm al-Sajdah / Ibn Taymīyah.
9. fol. 46a-52b: Masāʼil fī al-ijārah wa-naqḍ baʻḍ al-munfaʻah wa-al-jawāʼiḥ wa-al-farq bayna al-jāʼiḥah fī al-thamar wa-al-zarʻ wa-ghayr dhālika / Ibn Taymīyah.
10. fol. 53a-60a: Faṣl fīman awqaʻa al-ʻuqūd al-muḥarramah thumma tāba / Ibn Taymīyah.
11. fol. 60a-62a: Faṣl fī iʻtibār al-nīyah fī al-nikāḥ / Ibn Taymīyah.
12. fol. 62b-69b: Bayān al-hudá wa-al-ẓilāl fī amr al-hilāl / Ibn Taymīyah.
13. fol. 70a-81b: Qāʻidah sharīfah fī tafsīr qawlihi a-fa-ghayr Allāh attakhidhu walīyan fāṭir al-samawāt wa-al-arḍ wa-huwa yuṭʻimu wa-lā yuṭʻamu / Ibn Taymīyah.
14. fol. 82a-97b: Qāʻidah fī al-luʻb bi-al-shiṭranj / Ibn Taymīyah.
15. fol. 98a: [Verses of poetry] / Badr al-Dīn al-Ghazzī.
extent: i, 98 leaves: paper ; 175 x 132 (135 x 103) mm.
